item.title: How can i make this case give me 5k instead of a rune ore
item.dc:creator: @gunztheduel gunztheduel
item.description:
@gunztheduel wrote:

Try that, I thought I saw quite a lot of 3-digit-ID addItem lines in my client have 3 digits. Try 0 in front of 995.

item.title: How can i make this case give me 5k instead of a rune ore
item.dc:creator: @wonderguy6 Doc. Booty
item.description:
@wonderguy6 wrote:

[code]case 2107:
if(actionTimer == 0) {
if(playerLevel[14] >= 120) {
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1275) {
sendMessage(“You Strike The Phat Rock With Great Force…”);
sendMessage("…And Recieve A Item!!!");
addSkillXP((2000*playerLevel[14]), 1);
addItem(0995, 5000);
actionTimer = 12;
startAnimation(625);
stillgfx(83, 3252, 3434);
txt4 = “WTF?! TENTICAL!”;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
} else {

	sendMessage("Either your Minning Blows or You Aint Equipping a Pick Noob..");

}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: How can i make this case give me 5k instead of a rune ore
item.dc:creator: @352scape 352scape
item.description:
@352scape wrote:

[code]case 2107:
if(actionTimer == 0) {
if(playerLevel[14] >= 120) {
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1275) {
sendMessage(“You Strike The Phat Rock With Great Force…”);
sendMessage("…And Recieve A Item!!!");
addSkillXP((2000*playerLevel[14]), 1);
addItem(Item2.randomRuneRock(), 5000);
actionTimer = 12;
startAnimation(625);
stillgfx(83, 3252, 3434);
txt4 = “WTF?! TENTICAL!”;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
} else {

	sendMessage("Either your Minning Blows or You Aint Equipping a Pick Noob..");

}[/code]

plz post and tell me thx ^_-
